keyEvents.title: Yuba Mentioned as Development Site
keyEvents.description: Yuba is introduced as an oasis in Western Alabasta that Toto has been tasked with developing into a town.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Yuba as an important location that will become central to the rebellion storyline.

keyEvents.title: Koza Departs for Yuba
keyEvents.description: Koza leaves with his father Toto to help build Yuba with his own hands.
keyEvents.significance: Connects Koza to Yuba, setting up his later role in the drought-affected region.

geography: Located in the western region of Alabasta, serves as a hub for the area

statusHistory.description: Being developed from an oasis into a town by Toto and others

reveals.information: Yuba is an oasis in Western Alabasta being developed into a town
Koza and his father Toto moved to Yuba to help develop it

keyEvents.title: Young Koza Confronts King Cobra at Palace
keyEvents.description: In flashback, young Koza storms into the palace to confront King Cobra about the drought.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the palace as a place where citizens could directly appeal to their king.

keyEvents.title: Vivi Encounters Koza at Palace
keyEvents.description: Young Vivi witnesses Koza leaving the palace in tears and calls him a crybaby.
keyEvents.significance: The palace serves as the meeting point for the future friends.

geography: Central palace of Alubarna, the capital city of Alabasta
government: Royal Palace of the Nefertari Family

reveals.information: Citizens could directly approach the king at the palace with their concerns

keyEvents.title: Journey Through Desert Continues
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats, Vivi, and Ace continue their trek through the harsh Alabasta desert.
keyEvents.significance: Sets the scene for Vivi's emotional flashback story.

keyEvents.title: Vivi Tells Story in the Desert
keyEvents.description: While traveling through the desert, Vivi shares her childhood memories with Nami.
keyEvents.significance: The desert journey provides the setting for important character development.

geography: Vast desert covering much of Alabasta Kingdom
